body.name: Cosco Onlook 2-in-1 Convertible Car Seat, Rear-Facing 5-40 pounds and Forward-Facing 22-40 pounds and up to 43 inches, Black Arrows
features: With two modes of use, this LATCH-equipped Cosco car seat accommodates infants from 5 pounds up to toddlers weighing 40 pounds in rear-facing mode and kids up to 40 pounds in forward-facing mode.
The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the seat and features six heights and three buckle locations.
In both the rear-facing and forward-facing modes, built-in side-impact protection keeps your little one extra secure.
Easily remove the machine-washable and dryer-safe car seat pad to clean.
Perfect for travel, the seat is certified for use on aircraft and gives your child a familiar seat during a flight.
body.description: Give your child a comfy rear-facing ride with solid value and smart design all the way up to 40 pounds! With two modes of use, this LATCH-equipped Cosco car seat allows babies to remain in a safer rear-facing position up to 40 pounds. Accommodating your toddler, it can then change to forward-facing position 22 to 40 pounds and 43 inches in height. The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the seat and features six heights and three buckle locations. In both the rear-facing and forward-facing modes, built-in side-impact protection keeps your little one extra secure. Easily remove the machine-washable and dryer-safe car seat pad to clean. Perfect for travel, the seat is certified for use on aircraft and gives your child a familiar seat during a flight. This car seat meets or exceeds federal and ASTM safety standards and includes a one-year limited warranty. For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading childrens products brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value. From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design.(Actual fit may vary. Not all children will comfortably fit in the sear for the full weight and height ranges listed.).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us 70 years ago, COSCO started as the Columbus Specialty Company in Columbus, Indiana. It's where we got our name and it’s a place we're happy to call home. Many of our products are still made right down the street, and families have loved our high chairs, car seats, play yards and other items for generations. Over the years, we’ve never lost sight of the importance of having fun with our families and making life a bit easier for everyone. We know you will enjoy the simple, smart, and fun life that COSCO helps you live.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is helpful to have as a low cost transition car seat between infant and full booster. We have used it for all three of our kids and would recommend it! Easy to install, lightweight and not bulky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It definitely did the job, traveled with this and it was light eight and easy to switch to different vehicles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I travelled with this car seat with my 16 month old and had to use multiple cars. Installation took a few minutes to figure but afterwards was super quick and easy. Best quality of this car seat is that it is light weight! My daughter also loved the two cupholders. As the carseat is designed for a wide range of ages, I did insert a carseat pillow in order to make it more comfortable for my daughter as she is petite. I would not use this as my everyday car seat but it was great for travelling. The cover also removes easily for washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: Kinda bulky but was comfy for travel for my 2.5 year old . She took a lot of naps on it during car rides .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great seat for kids, if you doing a long drive maybe this might be no the great seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best carseat for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 under 5, and they go to a new person every day since we work, with this price point we are able to buy everyone their own fir the price one normally costs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars cover won't stay on seat
reviews.reviewText: I would not buy this product again. The car seat cover doesn't have loops to attach to the seat so that it will stay on the seat. Everytime I get my grandson in and out of the seat, the cover comes off the top . I do not recommend this product. I am so disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel car seat
reviews.reviewText: This was perfect for our trip that included a flight. It’s super lightweight so it was easy to carry through the airport, easy to install in the rental car and my son seemed comfortable in it throughout the trip. Will also double as a backup for the grandparents when they watch him! Definite must for travel with small kiddos!
muy bien respecto precio-calidad. Fácil de instalar, lo único es que los atrapa no tienen tanta facilidad de movimiento.
